Type.Name: XmlException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XmlException extends System.SystemException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Returns detailed information about the last exception.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An XML error has occurred." This message takes into account the current system culture.

value.para: A containing the character position where the error occurred.

remarks.para: The first character in the line is in position 1. Note that white space characters at the start of the line are not skipped.

summary.para: Gets the line position indicating where the error occurred.
